mapper.insert: insert into tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run ( SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN, SYSTEM_MODULE_ID, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, SONAR_QUALITY_GATE,SONAR_BUGS,SONAR_VULNERABILITIES,SONAR_CODE_SMELLS,SONAR_COVERAGE,SONAR_DUPLICATIONS, LAST_UPDATE_BY, SYSTEM_ID,SYSTEM_SCM_ID,LAST_UPDATE_DATE,JOB_NAME,CREATE_TYPE,JOB_TYPE,SONAR_UNIT_TEST_NUMBER,BUILD_STATUS) values ( #{systemJenkinsJobRun,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{systemModuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sonarQualityGate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sonarBugs,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sonarVulnerabilities,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sonarCodeSmells,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sonarCoverage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{sonarDuplications,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{systemScmId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createType,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{jobType,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{sonarUnitTestNumber,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{buildStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.sql: ID,SYSTEM_ID SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN, SYSTEM_MODULE_ID, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, SYSTEM_SCM_ID,JOB_NAME, LAST_UPDATE_DATE,SONAR_QUALITY_GATE,SONAR_BUGS,SONAR_VULNERABILITIES,SONAR_CODE_SMELLS,SONAR_COVERAGE,SYSTEM_ID,SONAR_DUPLICATIONS,create_type,JOB_TYPE,SONAR_UNIT_TEST_NUMBER,BUILD_STATUS
mapper.select:
select
from tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run where DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and SYSTEM_MODULE_ID is null and JOB_TYPE=1 and CREATE_TYPE=1 and status=1 order by LAST_UPDATE_DATE

select
from tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run where DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and SYSTEM_MODULE_ID is null and JOB_TYPE=2 and CREATE_TYPE=1 and status=1 order by LAST_UPDATE_DATE

select
from tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run where DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and SYSTEM_MODULE_ID is null and job_name=#{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and JOB_TYPE=1 and CREATE_TYPE=2 and status=1
and SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN in
#{jobRunid}
order by LAST_UPDATE_DATE

select
from tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run where
SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN=#{jobRunId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and status=1

select tsjr.*,tsm.module_name from tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run tsjr left join tbl_system_module tsm on tsm.id=tsjr.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID where tsjr.SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN=#{jobRunId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tsjr.status=1

select
from tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run where DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SYSTEM_MODULE_ID = #{moduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and system_id = #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and JOB_TYPE=1 and CREATE_TYPE=1 and status=1 order by LAST_UPDATE_DATE

select
from tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run where DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SYSTEM_MODULE_ID = #{moduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and system_id = #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and JOB_TYPE=2 and CREATE_TYPE=1 and status=1 order by LAST_UPDATE_DATE

select
from tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run where SYSTEM_MODULE_ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by CREATE_DATE limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run
ID,
SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN,
SYSTEM_MODULE_ID,
STATUS,
CREATE_BY,
CREATE_DATE,
LAST_UPDATE_BY,
LAST_UPDATE_DATE,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{systemJenkinsJobRun,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{systemModuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run
SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN = #{systemJenkinsJobRun,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SYSTEM_MODULE_ID = #{systemModuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BUILD_STATUS = #{buildStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId,jdbcType=TINYINT},
SONAR_QUALITY_GATE = #{sonarQualityGate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SONAR_BUGS = #{sonarBugs,jdbcType=TINYINT},
SONAR_VULNERABILITIES = #{sonarVulnerabilities,jdbcType=TINYINT},
SONAR_CODE_SMELLS = #{sonarCodeSmells,jdbcType=TINYINT},
SONAR_COVERAGE = #{sonarCoverage,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SONAR_DUPLICATIONS = #{sonarDuplications,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SONAR_UNIT_TEST_NUMBER = #{sonarUnitTestNumber,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run set SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN = #{systemJenkinsJobRun,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SYSTEM_MODULE_ID = #{systemModuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select GROUP_CONCAT(tsm.MODULE_NAME) as moduleNames from tbl_system_module_jenkins_job_run tsmjj left join tbl_system_module tsm on tsm.id=tsmjj.SYSTEM_MODULE_ID where tsmjj.SYSTEM_JENKINS_JOB_RUN=#{jobRunId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
